introduction.title: Start building financial independence right now!
introduction.description: CoinChange demo app will show you, how easy it is to start building your own crypto portfolio. At the same time, you will see how you compare to other users – who is the better investor? Just sign up and try it...

hotCoins.title: Explore crypto like Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Solana
hotCoins.subtitle: Simply and securely buy, sell, and manage dozens of cryptocurrencies.
